name: FUNKY BUSINESS
tag_list: experiential, marketing, solutions, public-relations, clients, service
overview:
Funky Business was born out of the love for experiential marketing, a special field that combines all possible manifestations of the 7 arts with an incredible number of other disciplines â€“ from both design and science fields: Marketing, Information Architecture, Writing, Visual Design, Computer Science, Research Methods, Psychology, Sociology, Physics, Anthropology.

It is a challenging field â€“ because it requires a broad knowledge base across so many disciplines and a deep knowledge across more than 1 discipline - which also makes it impossible not to love it.

The agency’s aim is to help its clients promote their products and services and increase their profitability through effective and powerful live communication.

In order to achieve this, FB provides unique solutions that go straight to the heart of our audience.

As a result, Funky Business has been pioneering experiential marketing on the Romanian market since 2001.
